task: Defeat the Doom of Mokhaiotl at depth 8 or deeper
rewardDescription: Best in slot boots for free. No need to camp Doom.

task: Defeat Sol Heredit
rewardDescription:
It gives the following benefits to special attacks:
- All special attacks cost 20% and have +100% accuracy.
- For each failed accuracy roll with a special attack, gain 10% Special Attack Energy.
- Whenever you kill an NPC, restore 15% Special Attack Energy (the npc does NOT need to be killed via special attack).

task: Fully decorate a magic totem in the Auburn Valley
rewardDescription: Provides unlimited elemental runes when equipped. Includes a passive effect where attacks will double an NPC's elemental weakness.

task: Kill an Ogress
rewardDescription:
Select three combat skills, then whenever you gain XP in one of the selected skills, you'll gain 50% of that XP in the other two selected skills.
Options are: Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, Magic, and Prayer

task: Defeat Jal-Zek within the Inferno
rewardDescription: Allows a player to always be on-task for all Slayer monsters and unlock all slayer task perks for free.

task: Obtain a rare drop from Yama
rewardDescription:
Gives the Last Stand ability, which works as follows:
 - If damage would reduce the player's HP to 0, instead of dying, the player will instead survive with 1 HP.
 - All combat stats are instantly boosted to 255 but begin draining rapidly back down to +15 above their base level.
 - For the next 16 ticks (9.6 seconds) after this ability is activated, the player's HP cannot be reduced to zero.
 - When the effect ends, all incoming damage is nullified and the player is healed based on the damage they dealt over the last 16 ticks.

Once this ability is used, it has a three-minute cooldown before it can activate again. Dying during the cooldown will be treated like a normal death, but instantly reset the cooldown.

task: Obtain a rare drop from Chambers of Xeric
rewardDescription: Choose one of Twisted bow with 4k dragon arrows , Scythe of vitur with 20k charges, Tumeken's shadow with 20k charges

task: Reach 2,000 total level
rewardDescription: Automatically completes all CAs and grants the player all rewards from the Grandmaster CA tier. All rewards including lamps are claimable.

task: Subdue the Moons of Peril
rewardDescription: Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Obtain a rare drop from The Hueycoatl
rewardDescription:
Auto completes the While Guthix Sleeps quest as well as all sub-quests. Notably completes:
 - Defender of Varrock
 - Dream Mentor
 - Eadgar's Ruse

task: Reach a total skill level of 500.
rewardDescription: An event lamp containing 25,000 XP to be used on any skill

task: Cook a shark while wearing a chef's hat
rewardDescription: The corrupted shark is not consumed when eaten and heals a base 20 hitpoints.

task: Defeat Zulrah with a blowpipe
rewardDescription: Auto completes the Monkey Madness II quest and all sub-quests.

task: Complete the Inferno in 30 minutes or less.
Obtain some Valuables from a house in Varlamore
Obtain a rare unique from the Barrows chest while wearing some Barrows equipment
rewardDescription: Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Drink a steamforge brew within the Stick Your Ore Inn
Chop maple logs
rewardName: Choose one of Power Miner , Lumberjack , Animal Wrangler

task: Defeat Scurrius
rewardName: One tier increase in all combat masteries

task: Kill a lizardman shaman in the Lizardman Temple
Complete the corrupted gauntlet
Gain over 30,000 coins from one Alchemy spell.
Steal from a fruit stall
Throw a gnomeball
Complete the Grid Master tutorial.
rewardName: Choose one of Power Miner , Lumberjack , Animal Wrangler

task: Equip any boots from the Stronghold of Security
Complete the Vampyre Slayer quest
Clean 3 grimy herbs
Obtain a rare drop from Vorkath
Catch a moth bare-handed
Subdue Tempoross
Mine gold ore
rewardName: Choose one of Power Miner , Lumberjack , Animal Wrangler

task: Witness the gemstone crab burrow away.
Make a Zamorak brew while wearing Zamorak monk robes in the Varrock chaos altar
Defeat TzTok-Jad
Defeat all 4 Awakened bosses.
Defeat Kalphite Queen
Equip a unique item from God Wars Dungeon
Open Bryophyta's chest
rewardName: One tier increase in all combat masteries

task: Check a grown fruit tree
Equip an Amulet of Fury
Complete floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre
Obtain a rare unique from Tombs of Amascut
rewardDescription: Choose one of Twisted bow with 4k dragon arrows , Scythe of vitur with 20k charges, Tumeken's shadow with 20k charges

task: Build a demonic throne in your player-owned house
Deposit a skillcape into your player-owned house
Defeat the lesser demon in the Wizards' Tower
Reach 1,500 total level
Obtain a rare drop from Araxxor
rewardDescription: Increase XP gain by 200% for all skills.

task: Obtain a rare drop from Theatre of Blood
